thread.title: Amazon adding 100K jobs for holiday season
thread.title_full: Amazon adding 100K jobs for holiday season

title: Amazon adding 100K jobs for holiday season
text:
Published By: CBS News: Moneywatch - Today 
Online retailer recently hired more than 25,000 people for full-time positions; it hired 80,000 workers last year for the holidays...
